message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  To kick off our negotiation, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,000,000. I believe this reflects the true value of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,800,000.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,800,000 is still quite a ways off from what I had in mind.  I could be persuaded to let it go for $1,900,000. I'm confident this is a fair price that reflects its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I am unable to meet the price of $1,900,000. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $1,700,000.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be frank, I'm getting close to listing this publicly if we can't come to an agreement. $1,850,000 is my absolute lowest price.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to make one last counteroffer of $1,750,000.
